enemies.name: Goblin
enemies.battle_description: As you walk into the clearing, you see a nasty looking creature turn to face you. It snarls, then jumps at you brandishing a knife!

enemies.name: Angry Squirrel
enemies.battle_description: You walk up to a gnarled tree and see a cute little squirrel nibbling on an acorn. It looks friendly, and you make a move to touch it, but it squeaks angrily and leaps at your face!
